segments.lesson_summary: Summary of segment 1: During this 4th grade mathematics lesson at Brewer Island School, students will be focusing on finding the area of shapes. Under the instruction of Akihiko Takahashi, the goal of this unit is to deepen students' understanding of the concept of area through engaging problem-solving activities. This lesson plan, prepared for the Lesson Study Workshop in San Mateo, CA, will take place from April 16-18, 2002. By the end of this unit, students will have a solid grasp on how to determine the area of various shapes, providing them with valuable math skills for future learning.
